SUBJECT: Updates
DETAILS: Dear Sir/Madam, We wish to inform you that, pursuant to the listing of the equity shares of our Company on the Emerge Platform (SME) of the National Stock Exchange of India Limited ( NSE ) and in continuation of our application made to the Registrar of Companies, Mumbai, the Corporate Identification Number (CIN) and the status of the Company have been updated in the Company Master Data on the Ministry of Corporate Affairs ( MCA ) portal.Accordingly, the CIN of the Company has been changed from U74140MH2003PLC142116 to L74140MH2003PLC142116, and the status has been updated from "Unlisted" to "Listed".A copy of the updated Company Master Data from the MCA website is enclosed for your reference.This is for the information of all stakeholders concerned.
